page.title: 12CAPENHURST SCHOOLYARD GAMES
page.content: Schoolyard games have changed little in 25 years and do not reflect the increased sophistication of toys ie. computers & electronic games have not had much effect though the influence of television is visible.The school is small so pupils of different ages and sexes usually play together.Here are the ten most popular games(type of game shown in brackets).Three Bad Eggs (ball)Captain On Board(position)Ball Tick(chase & ball)Three And You're In (ball)Rounders(ball)Spot(ball)Televisi on(quiz)British Bulldog(chase)I Wrote A Letter(chase)Icky 1-2-3(hide & seek) Skipping games are popular with both boys & girls also.Two children operate the long rope and othes have to run in and skip to standard rhymes such as Hot Cross Buns,Cowboy Joe and Red,Yellow,Purple and Green.
